com.azure.storage.file.models

Class ListSharesOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.storage.file.models.ListSharesOptions

  • public final class ListSharesOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of options for selecting shares from Storage File service.
    • Providing prefix will filter selections to shares that that begin with the prefix.
    • Providing maxResults will limit the number of shares returned in a single page.
    • Setting includeMetadata to true will include the metadata of each share, if false metadata for each share will be null.
    • Setting includeSnapshots to true will include snapshots of each share, the snapshot will be included as separate items in the response and will be identifiable by snapshot having a value. The base share will contain null for the snapshot.
